title: (x) serif face used on Double Sided website - ITC Charter {Dries Wiewauters}
content:
Hi, I stumbled across this font (see attached image) a few days ago and was wondering if anyone could help me identify it? Here's a link to the page I found it on:

[http://www.double-sided.com/docs/print/juliaclancey/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110203052425/http:/www.double-sided.com/docs/print/juliaclancey/index.html "http://www.double-sided.com/docs/print/juliaclancey/index.html")

Thanks!

Dave

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110203052425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture_1_5767.jpg)
author: WhitePepper

comments.content: That's Mathew Carter's version of the work of Fleishmann. The font's called Charter.
